amendment.description: to provide a deficit neutral reserve fund for Postal Service reform.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2852 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2852 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2681-2682; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2681) to provide a deficit neutral reserve fund for Postal Service reform.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2852 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
